/home/yunbo/clion-2017.3.2/bin/cmake/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/clang-4.0 -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/clang++-4.0 -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /home/yunbo/CLionProjects/Oasis

-- The CXX compiler identification is Clang 4.0.0
